item.title: Function FindBrokenAxe
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

Nice function, I might use it aswell.

A tip, It would be a good idea for it to check the axe your weilding aswell

item.title: Function FindBrokenAxe
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

[quote=“Secet, post:1, topic:64492”]{******************************************************************************* function FindBrokenAxe: Boolean; By: Secet Description: Looks inventory for broken axe. Results true if found. *******************************************************************************} function FindBrokenAxe: Boolean; var Broken,x,y: integer; begin Broken := DTMFromString('78DA6364676060606540011EF1990CFF81342' + '310FF07024636208399010D302291409A9B48356C04D470020976' + '22CCE126C21C1E026A40F670115003722F070135CC44AA6125A08' + '695701802003CA406D8'); GameTab(4); if (FindDTM(Broken,x,y,553,204,744,463)) then begin WriteLn('Ent broke our axe =('); Result := True; end else FreeDTM(Broken); end; [/quote]

Thanks secet. It is pretty good and i used it with my powercutter.

Read full topic

item.title: Function FindBrokenAxe
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

{******************************************************************************* function FindBrokenAxe: Boolean; By: Secet Description: Looks inventory for broken axe. Results true if found. *******************************************************************************} function FindBrokenAxe: Boolean; var Broken,x,y: integer; begin Broken := DTMFromString('78DA6364676060606540011EF1990CFF81342' + '310FF07024636208399010D302291409A9B48356C04D470020976' + '22CCE126C21C1E026A40F670115003722F070135CC44AA6125A08' + '695701802003CA406D8'); GameTab(4); if (FindDTM(Broken,x,y,553,204,744,463)) then begin WriteLn('Ent broke our axe =('); Result := True; end else FreeDTM(Broken); end;
